OOC: Uhhh, how is Recon on the Terrorcon's ship when he is also at the 
Chivtron base?

:::Scourge/Banzai-Tron/Hung-Grr/Ramjet:::

::He salutes to Motormaster and heads for the uncrashed shuttle, looking back 
to see if Squawktalk was following him::
~~~~~
::Banzai-Tron was hit by the power at the edge of the blast, now he was 
damaged pretty bad, but he continued to attack.  He charged up his arm and 
threw a high powered energy punch at Tigerhawk::
~~~~~
::Hun-Grr heard the voices of all his team members::
Hun-Grr: Good. We getting closer to earth. When we land we look for other 
Decepticons and join them.
::The ship is suddenly hit by a meteor and plummets down to earth, crashing 
near the Decepticon base.  Hun-Grr climbs out and looks around. There was a 
base close by::
Hun-Grr: Terrorcons, we go there!
::He starts walking toward the Decepticon base::
~~~~~
::Ramjet hears Like-Like's question::
Ramjet: I am leader now.  And my first order is that we fix this base, so 
please help if you can.
::He kept working on the base::

--part1_4b.88dcdd5.27dd0c58_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
